data.name: qryQuery.SelectStatement
qryListe2.SelectStatement
data.value:
DECLARE @Data Table( FaLeistungID INT, Datum DATETIME, MelderIn INT, NSB VARCHAR(100), Thema VARCHAR(100), Auflagendatum DATETIME )
---------------------------------- ---------- Collect Data ---------------------------------- INSERT INTO @Data SELECT GME.FaLeistungID, GME.DatumEingang, GME.FaKontaktveranlasserCode, GME.VmGefaehrdungNSBCodes, GME.FaThemaCodes, GME.AuflageDatum FROM dbo.VmGefaehrdungsMeldung GME INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = GME.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID --- AND ORG.OrgUnitID = {edtOrgUnitID}
WHERE CONVERT(DATETIME, GME.DatumEingang) BETWEEN {edtDatumVon} AND {edtDatumBis} AND GME.IsDeleted = 0 --- AND ORG.OrgUnitID = {edtOrgUnitID} --- AND USR.UserID = {edtUserID.LookupID}
------------------------------------------ ------------ Liste 2: Statistik ------------------------------------------ DECLARE @Statistik TABLE( Abteilung VARCHAR(100), SAR VARCHAR(100), [Anzahl GM] INT, [Anzahl häusl. Gew.] INT, [unabgeklärte GM] INT, [GM Pflegeplatz] INT, [GM Herkunftsfam.] INT, Sortkey1$ INT, Sortkey2$ INT )
------- Abteilung INSERT INTO @Statistik SELECT MAX(ORG.ItemName), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, ORG.OrgUnitID, NULL FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- Total Abteilung INSERT INTO @Statistik SELECT NULL, 'Total', COUNT(*), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Thema+',%' LIKE '%,9,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 9 Thema: häusliche Gewalt SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.NSB+',%' LIKE '%,1,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 1 VMGef. NSB: unabgekl. GM SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.NSB+',%' LIKE '%,2,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 2 VMGef. NSB: GM Pflegeplatz SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.NSB+',%' LIKE '%,3,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 3 VMGef. NSB: GM Herkunftsfamilie ORG.OrgUnitID, 2 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- Leerzeile pro Abteilung INSERT INTO @Statistik SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, ORG.OrgUnitID, 3 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY ORG.OrgUnitID
------- pro SAR INSERT INTO @Statistik SELECT NULL, MAX(USR.LastName + ISNULL(', ' + USR.FirstName,'')), COUNT(*), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Thema+',%' LIKE '%,9,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 9 Thema: häusliche Gewalt SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.NSB+',%' LIKE '%,1,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 1 VMGef. NSB: unabgekl. GM SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.NSB+',%' LIKE '%,2,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 2 VMGef. NSB: GM Pflegeplatz SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.NSB+',%' LIKE '%,3,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 3 VMGef. NSB: GM Herkunftsfamilie MAX(ORG.OrgUnitID), 1 FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID GROUP BY USR.UserID
------- Total INSERT INTO @Statistik SELECT 'Total', NULL, COUNT(*), SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.Thema+',%' LIKE '%,9,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 9 Thema: häusliche Gewalt SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.NSB+',%' LIKE '%,1,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 1 VMGef. NSB: unabgekl. GM SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.NSB+',%' LIKE '%,2,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 2 VMGef. NSB: GM Pflegeplatz SUM(CASE WHEN '%,'+DAT.NSB+',%' LIKE '%,3,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), ---- Code 3 VMGef. NSB: GM Herkunftsfamilie 9999999, NULL FROM @Data DAT INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.FaLeistungID = DAT.FaLeistungID INNER JOIN dbo.BaPerson PRS WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID INNER JOIN dbo.XUser USR WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON USR.UserID = FAL.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit_User OUU WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON OUU.UserID = USR.UserID AND OUU.OrgUnitMemberCode = 2 LEFT JOIN dbo.XOrgUnit ORG WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) on ORG.OrgUnitID = OUU.OrgUnitID
SELECT * FROM @Statistik ORDER BY Sortkey1$, Abteilung DESC, Sortkey2$, SAR
